#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int testcases;
scanf("%d",&testcases);
while(testcases--)
{
 int number_of_bombs;
 scanf("%d",&number_of_bombs);
 int X,Y;
 scanf("%d",&X);
 scanf("%d",&Y);
 int sum=0;
 for(int i=0;i<number_of_bombs;i++)
 {
     int x,y;
     scanf("%d",&x);scanf("%d",&y);
     x=x-X;
     y=y-Y;
     if(x<0){x=x*(-1);}
     if(y<0){y=y*(-1);}
     sum=sum + x+ y;
 }
 printf("%d\n",sum*2);
}
 return 0;
 }
